author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Pets of the week: Howie, Leroy, Rascal and Shaggy are ready for adoption
text:
Summary by Ground News Here are the pets of the week, available for adoption in the Long Beach area. Howie and Leroy, a bonded pair of 1-year-old domestic shorthair brothers, are looking for a home together. Rascal, a playful and energetic scamp, is looking for an adult home or a family with older teens who will continue his training. Share menu More
